title: Fork cord → @thesammykins/tether
description: Fork alexknowshtml/cord, rename to @thesammykins/tether. Refactor spawner into pluggable agent adapters (Claude Code, OpenCode, Codex CLI). Implement all 8 open GitHub issues: #1 allowlist, #2 ack emoji, #3 rate limiting, #4 session limits, #5 channel context, #6 smart thread naming, #7 exponential backoff, #8 pause/resume. Full test suite. Publish as @thesammykins/tether on npm.

description:
Fix 3 issues in bin/tether.ts and skills/tether/SKILL.md, plus add skill symlink to ~/.agents/skills:
1. PORT + AUTH: Align CLI with API on TETHER_API_PORT, add Authorization header when API_TOKEN is set.
2. SETUP PATH: Fix skills/cord → skills/tether reference.
3. AGENT CHECK: Check configured agent binary, not just claude.
4. SKILL SYMLINK: setup() should symlink the tether skill to ~/.agents/skills/tether (the new standard skill location).

title: Fix message flow: channel context injection, pause/resume replay, reset ordering
Persist OpenCode/Codex session IDs to database
description:
Fixed session ID persistence for OpenCode/Codex adapters. Added updateSessionId() function to db.ts that updates threads.session_id. Modified worker.ts to persist result.sessionId after adapter.spawn() returns if it differs from the initial sessionId. This ensures resume/continue functionality works for all adapters (OpenCode, Codex, Claude), not just Claude. Tests pass (148/149, 1 unrelated failure in adapter registry test).

Changes:
- src/db.ts: Added updateSessionId(threadId, sessionId) function
- src/worker.ts: Added import for updateSessionId and persistence logic after adapter.spawn()
